meanings.definition: A person or thing with no special or interesting qualities; an unimportant person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with nonentities, blending into the background.
meanings.sent2: The nonentities in the crowd went unnoticed by most people.
meanings.sent3: The nonentities at the party were like invisible ghosts, hardly making a ripple in the lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of things, we are all just nonentities floating in the vast sea of humanity.
meanings.sent5: The nonentities in the office seemed to fade into the beige walls, easily forgotten.

meanings.definition: A person or thing of no importance or significance.
meanings.sent1: She dismissed the critics as mere nonentities in the world of art.
meanings.sent2: The history books often forget about the nonentities who lived ordinary lives.
meanings.sent3: The nonentities in the story turned out to be the heroes in disguise, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The nonentities of society suddenly rose up and demanded to be heard, shocking the elites.
meanings.sent5: In the vast universe, we are but tiny nonentities, insignificant in the grand cosmic dance.
